org.eclipse.viatra.addon.validation.core

Class ValidationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.addon.validation.core.ValidationEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidationEngine

    public class ValidationEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements IValidationEngine
    This class uses an ViatraQueryEngine for tracking violations of ConstraintSpecifications. Use the builder() method for setting up a new instance through the ValidationEngineBuilder.
